message.initial_guidance: If you have already made a transfer, it is possible the network has not yet processed it. The app will periodically check network status and this message will disappear once verified.
message.troubleshooting_guidance: If you are still getting the message even after being sure a transfer has taken place, please try using the help feature by clicking the question mark in the top right corner to help diagnose the problem.

label.file_choose: Choose or drag a file here

message.backup_explained: When you click a wallet from the list below, two files will be downloaded which will allow you to import them easily back in to the AENConnect smart wallet. One is a plain text file and the other is encoded so that it can only be ready by this application. To later restore a given wallet, choose the import from file option during the add wallet procedure.

message.contract_found: The contract has been found, please review details below
message.contract_not_found: The contract could not be found, please check the address and / or network of the managing wallet

chunk.removal_warning: If you remove this contact from your address book, you will no longer be able to quickly look them up during operations and where applicable, the long form of their address will be used.

action.agreeEula: I agree to the AEN EULA

message.introduction: This is a first community release and should be treated as preview. {lease do not use this wallet to store real accounts on.

message.authenticate_to_continue: You must enter your password to continue
message.authenticate_cancel_question: You cannot proceed without authorisation. If you choose to cancel, all app data will be reset. Are you sure?
message.profile_remove_confirmation: If you remove the wallet preset, security options and challenges will revert to using the default / global options

label.backup_understand: I have backed up my wallet / understand that keeping it safe is my duty
label.name: Wallet Name

message.add_method: How do you want to setup your wallet?
message.add_success: Your wallet has been successfully setup
message.cannot_exceed_balance: Cannot exceed more than available balance
message.capabilities: With this wallet, you can now receive and transfer tokens using the AENChain network. Before proceeding, we strongly recommend you create a backup of your wallet using the button below.
message.blocked_until_transaction: This component will auto-update once a transaction has been made
message.initial_status: At the moment, your wallet is not live on the network. It is necessary to perform a transaction using this address before it has any presence.
message.network_recognise_wallet: The wallet is recognised on the network
message.network_miss_wallet: The wallet is not yet recognised on the network
message.remove_warning: If you remove the wallet, there will be no way to access it unless you have made a backup.
message.transfer_complete: Your transfer has been successfully dispatched to the network
